scripts.build:frontend: echo 'Building frontend...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No public directory'
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Building backend...' && mkdir -p build && cp server.js package.json .dockerignore build/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No backend directory'
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: eslint . --ext .js,.ts,.jsx,.tsx 2>/dev/null || echo 'ESLint not configured - skipping linting'
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --ext .js,.ts,.jsx,.tsx --fix 2>/dev/null || echo 'ESLint not configured - skipping linting'
